Package runtax

Class Rule

java.lang.Object
runtax.Rule
public class Rule extends Object
Rule describing a syntax assembled from contained Rules or given by the Rule#regex field.

Supports chained building directly and static creation of Rule objects via the Rule.Builder interface.

Since:
1.0.0
See Also:
  • RuleSet

    Description
    static interface 
    Rule.Builder
    The Builder interface allows static creation of Rule objects.

  • Method Details

    • regex

      public String regex()
      Get the regex associated with this Rule. If Rule#regex is null, call Rule#assemble() to generate it from the Rules in Rule#rules.

      Assembly may result in an empty String, but not null.

      Returns:
      The regex associated with this Rule, whether given at construction or assembled via Rule#assemble()
      See Also:
      • assemble()
      • regex

    • rule

      public Rule rule(Rule... rules)
      Chained building method overloading Rule#rule(String, Rule...).
      Parameters:
      rules - The rules to be collected in a single rule and appended to this rule
      Returns:
      This rule
      See Also:
      • rule(String, Rule...)

    • rule

      public Rule rule(String name, Rule... rules)
      Chained building method that collects the given rules into a single rule via the Rule.Builder#sequence(Rule...) method of the Rule.Builder interface and appends that to this rule as a Rule.RuleEntry, setting its name to name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the rule to be appended
      rules - The rules to be collected in a single rule and appended to this rule
      Returns:
      This rule
      See Also:
      • Rule.Builder.sequence(Rule...)
      • Rule.RuleEntry
      • rule(Rule...)

      public Rule regex(String regex)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      This rule

      • regex(String, String)

    • regex

      public Rule regex(String name, String regex)
      Chained building method that converts the given regex into a rule via the Rule.Builder#regex(String) method of the Rule.Builder interface and appends that to this rule as a Rule.RuleEntry, setting its name to name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the rule to be appended
      regex - The regex to be converted to a rule and appended to this rule
      Returns:
      This rule
      See Also:
      • Rule.RuleEntry
      • rule(String, Rule...)
      • Rule.Builder.regex(String)
      • regex(String)

    • text

      public Rule text(String name, String text)
      Chained building method that converts the given text into a rule via the Rule.Builder#text(String) method of the Rule.Builder interface and appends that to this rule as a Rule.RuleEntry, setting its name to name.
